languages.text: {n}Вокс затихает так надолго, что вы начинаете было думать, что устройство сломалось. Однако звенящую тишину разбивает абсолютно бесцветный голос Идиры.{/n} "Но я же тогда... умру?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Вокс затихает так надолго, что вы начинаете было думать, что устройство сломалось. Однако звенящую тишину разбивает абсолютно бесцветный голос Идиры.{/n} "Но я же тогда... умру?"

languages.text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вокс затихает так надолго, что вы начинаете было думать, что устройство сломалось. Однако звенящую тишину разбивает абсолютно бесцветный голос Идиры.{/n} "Но я же тогда... умру?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

{n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

{n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

{n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

{n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

languages.text: {n}通讯沉默了很久，你不禁开始怀疑是不是音阵系统出故障了。但随后，伊迪拉毫无生机的声音打破了沉默。{/n}“可是，这是不是意味着……我要死了？”
languages.original_text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}通讯沉默了很久，你不禁开始怀疑是不是音阵系统出故障了。但随后，伊迪拉毫无生机的声音打破了沉默。{/n}“可是，这是不是意味着……我要死了？”

languages.text: {n}El voco permanece en silencio tanto tiempo que empiezas a sospechar que se trata de una avería. Pero, de la nada, el silencio se rompe con la voz sin vida de Idira: {/n}«Pero eso quiere decir... que voy a morir, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El voco permanece en silencio tanto tiempo que empiezas a sospechar que se trata de una avería. Pero, de la nada, el silencio se rompe con la voz sin vida de Idira: {/n}«Pero eso quiere decir... que voy a morir, ¿no?».

languages.text: {n}Das Vox bleibt so lange still, dass du schon glaubst, es sei defekt. Doch dann wird die Stille von Idiras vollkommen lebloser Stimme zerschnitten:{/n} "Aber heißt das nicht ... dass ich sterben werde?"
languages.original_text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Vox bleibt so lange still, dass du schon glaubst, es sei defekt. Doch dann wird die Stille von Idiras vollkommen lebloser Stimme zerschnitten:{/n} "Aber heißt das nicht ... dass ich sterben werde?"

languages.text: {n}故障したのかと思うほど長い間、ヴォクスが沈黙していた。しかし、その沈黙はイディラによって破られる。声にはまったく生気がない。{/n}「でもそれって…あたいが死ぬってことじゃないの？」
languages.original_text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}故障したのかと思うほど長い間、ヴォクスが沈黙していた。しかし、その沈黙はイディラによって破られる。声にはまったく生気がない。{/n}「でもそれって…あたいが死ぬってことじゃないの？」

languages.text: {n}Le vox reste si longtemps silencieux que vous commencez à suspecter quelque défaillance. Puis le silence est rompu par la voix atone d'Idira :{/n} « Mais cela ne signifie-t-il pas... que je vais mourir ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le vox reste si longtemps silencieux que vous commencez à suspecter quelque défaillance. Puis le silence est rompu par la voix atone d'Idira :{/n} « Mais cela ne signifie-t-il pas... que je vais mourir ? »

languages.text: {n}Voks o kadar uzun süre sessiz kalıyor ki bozulduğunu düşünmeye başlıyorsun. Sonrasında İdira'nın tamamıyla donuk sesi, sessizliği bölünüyor.{/n} "Fakat bu... Öleceğim anlamına gelmez mi?"
languages.original_text: {n}The vox goes silent for such a long time that you begin to suspect a malfunction. But then the silence is shattered by Idira's utterly lifeless voice:{/n} "But doesn't that mean... I'm going to die?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Voks o kadar uzun süre sessiz kalıyor ki bozulduğunu düşünmeye başlıyorsun. Sonra sessizlik İdira'nın tamamıyla donuk sesiyle bölünüyor:{/n} "Fakat bu... Öleceğim anlamına gelmez mi?"
